name: All In One Form Verification
author: VerifyBee

sections.description:
We designed this plugin to compliment your most used submission form plugins. We all want to ensure the leads we get are legitimate and reachable. Our All In One Form Verification allows you to easily verify emails of all submissions and only accept submissions from users who provide valid emails! This helps your intake and sales teams and streamlines your user flow!

Currently we integrate with:

  • verify js widget
  • Contact Form 7
  • Gravity Form
  • WP Fluent Form
  • WP Fluent Form
  • Formidable Forms Builder
  • Contact Form by WPForms

One plugin that integrates with both form types. Just install, activate and add your API key by creating a Free Account.

Our goal is to help ensure you have a clean list and that your emails bounceless or actually neverbounce. Be sure to request additional integrations if needed, or I you have questions feel free to reach out to our support staff.

If you are looking for more in depth understanding on how to better manage, update and create an effective email list checkout our education material section on our website for more insights.
sections.installation:
Search for the VerifyBee plugin via the Plugins section of your WordPress dashboard.
Install and activate the plugin.

Go to the Settings page and copy/paste the API key from this page of your VerifyBee account. You only need to do this once.

Manual:
1. Upload cn-verifying-email.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
3. Optional: Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
sections.faq:
How does the verification work?

You insert your VerifyBee API in the settings page which allows the plugin to connect to our servers and verify the email address provided in the form.

How many emails can I verify?

You can verify 100 emails for free

Do you have a free email checker?

Yes you can easily validate a few emails for free using our free email checker
